name: Cinelerra
description: Cinelerra is a video editor. It provides video capturing, video synthesis, editing of audio and video, importing/exporting, cluster rendering, and other functions. And it supports HDTV format.

zh_CN.description: Cinelerra是一个视频编辑软件，它提供了视频捕捉、视频合成、音频和视频编辑等功能，还具有输入/输出、渲染集群以及支持HDTV格式等功能。
zh_CN.name: Cinelerra
